Welcome to the WorkBC Registration and I: Welcome to the WorkBC Registration and Intake survey. Your feedback is important as it will help improve WorkBC for yourself and other British Columbians.
The survey will take about 2 to 3 minute: The survey will take about 2 to 3 minutes to complete.
Use the buttons at the bottom of the pag: Use the buttons at the bottom of the page to move through the survey. Using the Internet browser buttons will not work.
Complete the survey in one sitting. Your: Complete the survey in one sitting. Your answers will not be saved if you close the survey.
When you’re done, click on the \"Submit\: When you’re done, click on the "Submit" button at the end of the survey.
If you are using assistive technology (s: If you are using assistive technology (such as JAWS or Dragon), use your navigation keys/commands to complete the survey. You can use the keyboard spacebar on the "Back", "Next" and "Submit" buttons to navigate through the survey.
privacyAndConfidentialityStatement1: Your responses are confidential. When survey results are reported, your responses will be grouped with the responses of others to ensure confidentiality. Grouped results will be used for program improvements. Please do not include any personal information in your responses.
privacyAndConfidentialityStatement2: Please note that all information is being collected under the authority of the Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act, Section 26(e). If you have any questions about the collection or use of this information, please contact the Client Engagement team, Ministry of Social Development and Poverty Reduction.
How did you hear about WorkBC? Please se: How did you hear about WorkBC? Please select all that apply.
Recommended by a friend or colleague: Recommended by a friend or colleague
Referred by government or other agencies: Referred by government or other agencies (Income assistance staff, Indigenous agencies, etc.)
You indicated you heard about WorkBC som: You indicated you heard about WorkBC some other way. Please describe in the space below.
Overall, it was easy for me to get start: Overall, it was easy for me to get started with WorkBC.
Please provide any additional details or: Please provide any additional details or comments about your experience with the application process.
I am satisfied with the speed of communi: I am satisfied with the speed of communication received from WorkBC.
Please provide any additional details or: Please provide any additional details or comments about your experience with the WorkBC staff.
I am satisfied with WorkBC services so f: I am satisfied with WorkBC services so far.
I feel confident that I will find and ke: I feel confident that I will find and keep employment since contacting WorkBC.
How can we make the registration and int: How can we make the registration and intake process better for you? Please feel free to include any comments, suggestions, or feedback.
Please rate your level of agreement with: Please rate your level of agreement with the following statement using a scale of 1 to 5, where 1 = Strongly disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Neither agree nor disagree, 4 = Agree, 5 = Strongly agree.
Please rate your level of agreement with the following statements using a scale of 1 to 5, where 1 = Strongly disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Neither agree nor disagree, 4 = Agree, 5 = Strongly agree.
